Name: Mori
About the game: MORI is DEAD But as long as that upsets you, you can avenge yourself. Not much is known about your killer, and even less about the mysterious, shifting desert where they left your bones. Features: A modular Lemat revolver Over 40 upgrade items that make each run unique A talking snake to sell them to you Rage inducing enemies Sand Secrets
